name: Paras Tanna
top_product: - Mutual Funds – For disciplined, long-term wealth creation through SIPs and lumpsum investments. - Structured Investment Funds (SIFs) – Curated solutions combining capital protection with growth potential. - Portfolio Management Services (PMS) – Professionally managed equity portfolios for HNIs seeking active strategies. - Alternative Investment Funds (AIFs) – For sophisticated investors exploring non-traditional, high-ticket opportunities. -Insurance (Term & Health) – To protect what truly matters—your family, future, and financial plans.
ideal_referral: - HR Heads of Companies – For conducting employee financial wellness sessions and setting up SIPs or goal-based planning for staff. - School & College Principals – For parent workshops on planning for children’s education and building financial habits early. - Government Department Heads – For structured retirement and goal-planning sessions for employees nearing retirement. - Owners of Co-Working Spaces & Startups – To guide young professionals and founders in setting up disciplined wealth systems. -Chartered Accountants & Tax Consultants – Trusted advisors who can refer clients for investment solutions beyond compliance.
top_problem_solved: Most people know they should invest, but they don’t know how much, for what, or where to start. I solved this by creating a simple, relatable system through Plan Karo India that helps individuals plan their financial goals in their budget—without jargon, pressure, or confusion. It’s like giving people a financial Google Maps: you tell me where you want to go, I help you plan the route.

name: Rahul Koladiya

ideal_referral: The roof should have adequate sun exposure (facing south is ideal) and be in good condition to support the weight of the panels.
top_problem_solved: 1. High Electricity Costs Solar Solution: Solar drastically reduces utility bills by generating your own electricity from sunlight. Especially valuable for: Homes, businesses with high energy use, and industrial plants. 2. Dependence on Fossil Fuels Solar Solution: Solar energy is clean, renewable, and reduces reliance on coal, gas, and oil. Result: Cuts pollution, stabilizes long-term energy supply. 3. Grid Instability & Outages Solar + Battery Storage: Combining solar with batteries. 4. Carbon Emissions & Climate Change Solar Solution: Zero-emission power generation means a reduced carbon footprint. Impact: Helps businesses meet sustainability goals and comply with emissions regulations. 5. Lack of Access to Energy (in remote areas) Off-Grid Solar Systems: Solar can provide power where traditional infrastructure is missing or too costly. Used for: Rural homes, agricultural operations, remote industries. 6. Rising Energy Demand Scalable Solar Installations: Solar scales from small home setups to large commercial solar farms to meet growing demand. 7. Limited Lifespan & Maintenance of Traditional Systems Durable & Low-Maintenance Solar Tech: Modern solar panels last 25+ years
my_favourite_bni_story: Favorite BNI Story: The “Unexpected Referral” A BNI member who ran a small landscaping business once gave a referral to a fellow member who was a local electrician. The referral was for a modest job — just installing some outdoor Solar System. Because the electrician did such a great job, the client was thrilled and ended up telling their neighbor, who owned a large commercial building. That neighbor then contacted the electrician to do a complete electrical retrofit for the entire building — a huge, multi-thousand- Rupees project! The electrician later credited that first small referral as the start of a cascade of bigger business that came entirely through BNI connections and trust. --- Why this story is loved: It shows how one small referral can snowball into major opportunities. It emphasizes the importance of doing excellent work to earn trust. It proves that BNI networking isn’t just about immediate sales, but building relationships that pay off long-term.

top_problem_solved: Indian Talk's Restaurant in Bali started with a single branch and has now expanded to four locations. With flights from Denpasar to India typically departing around 12 PM local time, travelers often check out by 8 AM to reach the airport on time. This means many guests end up skipping breakfast and face long hours of travel without proper meals. Introducing the "Take Away" Campaign by Indian Talk's Restaurant—a game-changer for travelers at Denpasar Airport! Our team ensures a hassle-free, pre-booked meal is ready for pickup at the airport, so you can enjoy fresh and authentic Indian food on your journey.
my_favourite_bni_story: My favorite BNI story is how joining the organization helped me become more efficient in managing my time and tasks. Before BNI, I often struggled with juggling multiple responsibilities. However, being a part of BNI taught me valuable time management skills and the importance of efficient networking. Through the structure and accountability within BNI, I was able to streamline my processes, prioritize better, and significantly boost my productivity. It's truly been a game-changer in how I manage both my professional and personal commitments.
